snippet.title: Nintendo Switch™　I am an Air Traffic Controller - AIRPORT HERO HANEDA　Promotional Movie
snippet.description:
I am an Air Traffic Controller - AIRPORT HERO HANEDA, the air traffic control and puzzle game,
is now available on Nintendo Switch!

This is the latest title in the popular series where you take on the role of an air traffic controller
and give instructions to aircraft!


【Official Site】http://www.sonicpowered.co.jp/world/nsw/eu-rjtt/
【Twitter】https://twitter.com/AIRPORTHERO_PR

#AirTrafficController #AIRPORTHERO #Switch #aircraft #Game

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Title:                      I am an Air Traffic Controller - AIRPORT HERO HANEDA
Release date:       7 February 2023
Platform:              Nintendo Switch ／ Nintendo Switch Lite ／ Nintendo Switch (OLED Model)
Genre:                   Air Traffic Controller Simulation / Puzzle
No. of players:     Single System (1)
Languages:          English / Japanese
Download Here:  https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/I-am-an-Air-Traffic-Controller-AIRPORT-HERO-HANEDA-2339466.html
Publisher:             Sonic Powered Co., Ltd.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
